instructions:
A partially-automated character sheet for 13th Age Glorantha, with some extra customisation options for homebrew settings.

Version: @@version

If you find bugs or have suggestions, please use the [Github issue tracker](https://github.com/Seraaron/roll20-character-sheets/issues) for this sheet.

For changelogs and usage documentation, please check the [README](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/13th_Age-neovatar/README.md#changelog) on the Roll20.net Github repository.
